body: A Brooklyn man has been arrested and charged with attacking four young women as they jogged or walked alone in Park Slope and nearby neighborhoods over the weekend, the police said yesterday. The suspect, Michael Bowden, 30, was arrested in a surveillance operation quickly organized by the police to catch the attacker before he struck again, said
title: Man Held in Weekend Attacks On Four Women in Brooklyn

author: George F. Custen, a resident of Park Slope, is director of the film studies program at the City University Graduate Center and author of ''20th Century's Fox: Darryl F. Zanuck and the Culture of Hollywood.''
body: Despite their statistical rarity, the famous seem to be everywhere in New York. So residents take it for granted that from time to time, they will come face to face with someone famous. title: CITY LORE; Yes! It's Him! (Whaddya Mean, Never Heard of Him?)

body: IF you didn't know to look for it, you could easily miss the stone marker that Herman Benson planted outside his house the other week. The granite and marble rectangle lies under a pine tree in Mr. Benson's front garden. It doesn't say much. But it tells you more than enough. Revella Benson, it says. The stone does not mention that she once worked
title: NYC; A Man's Rage At a Killer Is Set in Stone
